base_description: Gray rectangular box, medium-sized, modern design.
part_description: Single main body with a top lid, smooth edges, vertical orientation, and uniform gray color.
internal_interaction_description: The lid is hinged to the main body, allowing it to open and close smoothly. The interior is hollow, designed to hold items securely when the lid is closed.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces and interacts with users who can open the lid to store or retrieve items. Its neutral color allows it to blend with various environments.
